reviews.review: Este sem dúvidas foi o melhor jogo que comprei este ano. A soundtrack é absurdamente incrível, os gráficos são impecáveis, a jogabilidade não tem comparação. A história do jogo é muito boa e conhecê-lá é essencial para um melhor compreendimento a história completa do Bioshock, eu recomendo esse jogo a qualquer pessoa, mesmo sendo um jogo ''generalizado'' de FPS, ele atraí jogadores de outros estilos, assim como o meu. O mapa possui uma diversidade de itens que você pode coletar, upgrades e etc acho uma coisa bem legal que acrescenta um pouco mais no gameplay. Existem coisas que você só encontra no jogo se você realmente explorar o cenário, Um título incrível para os jogos de hoje em dia.

BioShock Infinite:

8/10

Pros:
- Intriguing story
- One of the best characters ever in a video game
- Amazing atmosphere

Cons:
- Generic gameplay

Bioshock Infinite has one of the most interesting stories I've ever seen in a video game. From beginning to end, it had me on my toes, trying to figure out what would happen next. And not to mention it has some of the most realistic and unique characters that I've seen, or the fact that the setting is beautiful. But while Infinite is great in these regards, there is one part in which the game falls flat: the gameplay. Infinite has the gameplay stylings of generic first-person shooter, complete with regenerating shield and two-weapon limit. The skyhook was a nice addition, but the majority of the vigors consist of a different elemental grenade. Even with the unoriginal gameplay, the game still manages to be fully enjoyable.

Awesome game! The atmosphere is amazing and makes you play for hours and hours.

very good game with an amazing ending, as a story, the bioshock franchise stands above all, and infinite follows suit. It not only produces an amazing standalone game, but links the universe together without being cheesy and/or over complicated. Also the intricate character development makes the twist at the end even more devastating, although it could have been wrapped up quicker, that's the only thing i can see wrong with it plot-wise. As always the devs have created a utopiam/dystopian world depending on where you stand, the aesthetics are perfect and although the gameplay can feel repetitive at times, for the most part it's sound, also, the social and political allegorys may be obvious, but they are very effective.
Well crafted, lovely to look at and play. New DLC is awesome - great to be back in Rapture!

I had my doubts going into this game, seeing as it was leaving Rapture and entering an entirely new universe. But WOW. Definitely a game worthy of the Bioshock title. The game's style is almost flawless [I would've liked if they had kept the little visual details on upgraded weapons as they gave that sense of personalisation that really made a weapon your own, but they're a minor loss], and the story is incredible. It puts an entirely new perspective on the series as a whole in ways I couldn't've imagined. For anyone still hesitent about this game, take it from me. You WON'T be disappointed. Worth every cent....or rather, Silver Eagle...

Forse volendoci trovare un "neo" diciamo che si sente che manca qualcosina nella componente FPS del gioco..ma nulla di così rilevante..tutti gli altri aspetti PRO del gioco oscurano pienamente questo neo.

Das Spiel ist in einer ziemlich schrägen Welt aufgebaut und von Anfang an ergeben sich ziemlich viele merkwürdige Rätsel. Unser Spielcharakter hat Schulden und will diese begleichen indem er für die Drahtzieher ein Mädchen rettet und es diesen vorliefert. Das Mädchen namens Elizabeth begleitet uns sozusagen durch das ganze Spiel und hat tolle Funktionen, beispielsweise kann sie Dinge aus fernen Welten beschwören, wirft uns immer wieder gefundene Gegenstände wie Geld, Munition oder Heilung zu. Auch wir haben verschiedene und starke Mächte, mit denen wir Gegner besiegen können. Insgesamt sind es 8, angefangen von Lavabällen bis zu Krähen, die unseren Gegner verspeisen.

Die Handlung ist stetig spannend und Gott sei Dank, so wie es in vielen Spielen leider nicht ist, wechseln wir oft die Umgebung. Es gibt auch Nebenmissionen und immer wieder sind Gegenstände aufzufinden, die nicht zum eigentlichem Spielverlauf gehören. Nach und nach finden wir verschiedene Waffen, anngefangen von einer Pistole bis zur Schroftflinte und Bazooka, sogar ein Granatenwerfer ist dabei. Von Einzelschuss- bis 3erschusswaffen ist das Sortiment relativ groß. Interessant sind die vielen Läden die unterwegs zu finden sind, sie verkaufen von Munition und Medipack's bis hin zu Schadensboost für Waffen und Fähigkeiten so ziemlich alles. Fast jede Leiche lässt uns Kohle da sodass es kaum möglich ist pleite zu gehen. 

Der allgemeine Aufbau ist toll, es gibt die wichtigsten Funktionen wie Sprint, Zielen, Springen und Klettern. Wir haben sogar eine Nahkampfwaffe, mit der man Gegner die Köpfe abreissen kann und auch hier gibt es einzelne tolle Spezialeffekte. Ich bin schon gespannt wie das Spiel weitergeht und endet, die Story lässt viele Frage offen und bringt den Spieler oft zum Denken, genau so muss ein Ego-Shooter sein.

Ein Fazit am Ende: Die Story ist zwar relativ kurz, aber emotional sehr packend. Ich hätte mit Ende NIEMALS gerechnet und alle Rätsel werden aufgelöst. Das Ende ist unglaublich spannend, packed, herausfordernd und aufklärend. Es ist das erste Spiel, das mich so extrem gepackt hat. Der Kauf ist völlig empfehlenswert, selten so ein unfassbar gutes Spiel gespielt.
Was a great game with twists and turns I never expected.
Pesquisei muito antes de comprar, e agora sei por que toda análise que eu encontrava era sempre nota máxima! Excelente jogo, excelente compra, vale muito a pena (:

If you're a devoted fan of first-person shooters, the game will give you a reasonable challenge should you unlock the 1999 mode. While I do think there are balance issues with certain gear/skills/weapons being a clearly better choice over others, there is *some* freedom in choosing a playstyle.

The gameplay itself, is decent. The skyhook mechanic is (pun intended) on rails so there isn't as much freedom to toy with it as you might think from the trailers. You mostly just use it to get to the next destination, find a few hidden spots for bonus loot, and kill a few baddies for free. If the story and visual/audio components were as so-so as the combat, I'd say this would be a pretty average, wait for a sale kind of title.

With the bad news out of the way: One of my favorite games of all time. It's extremely rare that I play a video game with a story as good as this. Ironically, the first Bioshock is one of the few that has a story that can compare in terms of depth and surprise. If you aren't a fan of first-person shooters, just play it on easy, listen to all the character banter as you explore, read all the signage, and enjoy the gorgeous visuals and music. The story alone was worth the full price but now you can get it for as low as $10 if you hunt around the web.

A beautiful story driven by strong character development

oh, and the gunplay is lots of fun too!

P.S. don't bother buying any of the DLC, if u care about the story as much as I did

So this game has been out for a little while now and everyone has probably seen reviews for it but i still want to do this :p, i feel like bioshock infinite did really well with a lot of things like the weapons and the combat, special  enemies would come andwould give you a challenge every once in a while. then came the characters which they did really well with, i loved how i got to learn about booker and elizabeth and felt like i could connect to those characters and feel what they feel.they also did amazing with the world of columbia which looked amazing and really different to rapture of course because it wasnt all dead and abandoned. they also did really well with A.I for elizabeth because she would get in your way and she could take care of herself and also give you items whenever you would need them like ammo,health and salts.i feel like they did everything really well except for the ending which i felt like could be better or changed in a way where it could of been fixed. but it is a for sure game to have and play,cause i know i will start to replay it on 1999 mode.

Nice art and sound design!  There is what felt to me a little bit of backtracking, which makes the game feel a bit repetitive at times.  Overall I'd give it a 6.5/10.

very good game !

Uses expertly crafted gameplay to tell a lively, twisting story reminiscent of Wells or Asimov; not High Art, but memorable, thought-provoking, and thoroughly entertaining. The world-building is a delight for anyone familiar with the Gilded Age, or who just doesn't mind some vicious satire of American Exceptionalism. Which, sad to say, remains relevant. The DLC is really top-notch, too. I recommend the Season Pass because if you like Bioshock Infinite there's no chance you won't like the DLC, and if you like the DLC there's no chance you're going to suddenly stop liking it after the first episode.

If you like fps games that are a bit different than the usual, then this is a great game for you. It's beautiful, even on low graphics, and you don't need a strong pc to run it, really.

However, if you're a big fan of Bioshock, this is the worst game in the series. It's still enjoyable though.
Really good game! I think the story of the game was the highlight. The game play is also quite fun. This title manages to engage you and retain your focus which I believe to be a good thing.
BioShock.... just amazing, and with the DLC that much better. It was a great trilogy, and getting to back to the first two games F@ck yes!!!!

Good story, good art , good music , good acting ,good controls, i don't see why not give this game a 9.5/10
could be better if there was more functions from the old bioshocks (suchas hacking turrets and sentries)and something equivalent to big daddies, but still an over the top experience.
Майндфак. Игра идеальна.

Игра с которой и началось моё знакомство с серией Bioshock. Так как мое мнение не поддается ностальгии по первым двум частям, я могу оценить игру только как самостоятельный проект. Игра на 8/10 (учитывая, что на дворе 2016). Вторая половина слегка нудновата, и в ней недостает мелких деталей, как будто разработчики сами говорят, давай быстрее там концовка огонь. Концовка и вправду огонь, но чтоб допереть до общей картины мне пришлось смотреть объяснение на ютубе и еще раз пройти игру (о чем ни капли не жалею)
P.S. На Bioshock infinite моё знакомство с серии и закончилось. Не мог осилить первую часть из устаревшей графики, хотел пройти ремастер, да все времени никак не найдется.
Questo è un gioco da avere assolutamente!

Graphics are wonderfull. But background is stuck so you can't even brake a vase. Also during the game you can just carry two weapons at a time. Also some Vigors (your powers in the game) are unnecessary. But also it takes you a different and adventures world. Also there aren't any alternative ending.

But throuh all of that one of the best games ever. I highly recommend to play.

Die ersten beiden Teile waren schon recht gut. 
Aber mit Infinite und vor allem durch Infinite ist die Reihe in meinen Top 10 aller Zeiten gelandet. 
Das formuliere ich deshalb so, weil ich den dritten Teil um Längen besser finde als die beiden Vorherigen.
Aber auch die gesamte Geschichte, incl. der Vorgänger, ist einer der Gründe, warum Infinite so gut ist. Man sollte alle drei gespielt haben.

Von Bioshock habe ich damals eigentlich einen RPG-Shooter im Stil von System Shock erwartet. Schließlich ist Bioshock dessen geistige Erbe. 
Als ich bemerkt habe, dass es eigentlich nur ein Shooter ist, war ich etwas enttäuscht. 
Die tolle Atmosphäre und das Gameplay haben es aber gerettet.

Von Infinite habe ich nicht viel mehr erwartet als von den Vorgängern. Eher weniger, da mich der Grafikstil von Teil 1 und 2 eher angesprochen hat. 
Was mir Infinite dann aber gegeben hat, war eins der intensivsten Spielerlebnisse meiner über 20-jährigen Zocker-Laufbahn.

Die fliegende Stadt empfand ich anfangs als übertrieben. Auch das Design war mir insgesamt zu hell und blass. Schnell wird man aber vom rasanten Gameplay, dem tollen Leveldesign und der spannenden Handlung in den Bann gezogen. 

In den Außenarealen findet die Fortbewegung zwischen den einzelnen Stadtteilen über ein achterbahnartiges, schwebendes Schiennenetz statt, wo man an den Schienen hängend zwischen den Gebäuden hin- und herrast. Dies ist grandios umgesetzt und macht großen Spass.
Den Kämpfen verleiht es außerdem eine großartige Dynamik. 

Ab dem ersten Drittel der Spielzeit entfaltet sich dann langsam die Handlung. 
Ab da war ich verloren. 
Wenn man morgens aufwacht und das erste, woran man denkt, ein Spiel ist - das kannte ich bis jetzt nur von J-RPGs. 
Spannend, bewegend, komplex, mysteriös, verrückt. Am Ende war ich sprachlos. 
An dieses Spiel werde ich mich noch lange erinnern.
Определенно одна из лучших игр 2013 года. Сильнейший аспект игры- сюжет, атмосфера и проработка персонажей
Lets see what this game has: Eye Candy, Great Story, Good Graphics, may I go on?

Визуально игра выглядит превосходно. Непросто представить, сколько человеко-часов было потрачено на создание таких масштабных и одновременно красивых локаций. Стиль выдержан идеально, декорации лишь некоторыми деталями напоминают о прошлых играх серии, в основном тебя погружают в совершенно другую атмосферу. Рассматривать город и его детали не надоедает до конца игры.
Персонажи. В игре есть по сути только один действительно интересный герой, и это Элизабет. Не обладая хорошей лицевой анимацией и сверх графикой, разработчикам удалось сделать её предельно “живой”. За счёт замечательной озвучки, крайне выразительных глаз и милого личика(как хорошо, что в игре у героини нет черт  Анны Молевой), следить за Элизабет и общаться с ней – одно удовольствие. Она – один из самых ярких героев за последний год.
most excellent
A truly superb game, loved the art style and overall experience, really recommended.

Melhor jogo que ja joguei, simplesmente incrivel, grande história com um otimo final.

One of the best games that I have ever played. The graphics, audio, and plot line were some of the greatest that I've seen. I found myself getting sucked into the game at every turn and honestly cared for each of the characters. The one thing that I didn't like was the combat. I felt that I became overpowered early on in the game. I rarely came close to death, and only died a handful of times. If you're playing this game for the shooter aspect, prepare to be disappointed. If you're playing because you want to be completely immersed in a rich world with amazing characters, then give it a try.
Love it! Best game I have played in a while.
